definitions.definition: Any member of an aboriginal hunter-gatherer tribe of India , inhabiting the states of Orissa and Andhra Pradesh ( Srikakulam ), and speakers of the Dravidian Kui and Kuvi languages .

main_definition: Any member of an aboriginal hunter-gatherer tribe of India , inhabiting the states of Orissa and Andhra Pradesh ( Srikakulam ), and speakers of the Dravidian Kui and Kuvi languages .
